title: Talking about Troubles - series of adjectives

content.question: In context, the series of adjectives before "fright" (Paragraph 6) is meant to

choices.label: convey the author's surprise on experiencing an emotion
insinuate the foolishness of betraying an emotion
evoke the mounting intensity of an emotion
question the wisdom of concealing emotion

content.answer: evoke the mounting intensity of an emotion
